name: 1080º Snowboarding
description:
Get ready to experience one of the first truly realistic snowboarding games ever created! Select from five characters, each with their own attributes and special tricks. Pick a snowboard that best suits your rider, and then head down the mountain and feel the sensation of speed that'll make you forget all about the cold!

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
